00002 #define _API_SYSTEM_CALL_DEFINITIONS_
00003 #include <types/memory.h>

00005 #define DECL_SYSCALL0(fn) MEM_LOC syscall_##fn();
00006 #define DECL_SYSCALL1(fn,p1) MEM_LOC syscall_##fn(p1);
00007 #define DECL_SYSCALL2(fn,p1,p2) MEM_LOC syscall_##fn(p1,p2);
00008 #define DECL_SYSCALL3(fn,p1,p2,p3) MEM_LOC syscall_##fn(p1,p2,p3);
00009 #define DECL_SYSCALL4(fn,p1,p2,p3,p4) MEM_LOC syscall_##fn(p1,p2,p3,p4);
00010 #define DECL_SYSCALL5(fn,p1,p2,p3,p4,p5) MEM_LOC syscall_##fn(p1,p2,p3,p4,p5);

00012 #define DEFN_SYSCALL0(fn, num) \
00013         MEM_LOC syscall_##fn() \
00014         { \
00015          MEM_LOC a; \
00016          asm volatile("int $127" : "=a" (a) : "0" (num)); \
00017          return a; \
00018         }
00019 
00020 #define DEFN_SYSCALL1(fn, num, P1) \
00021         MEM_LOC syscall_##fn(P1 p1) \
00022         { \
00023          MEM_LOC a; \
00024          asm volatile("int $127" : "=a" (a) : "0" (num), "b" ((int)p1)); \
00025          return a; \
00026         }
00027 
00028 #define DEFN_SYSCALL2(fn, num, P1, P2) \
00029         MEM_LOC syscall_##fn(P1 p1, P2 p2) \
00030         { \
00031          MEM_LOC a; \
00032          asm volatile("int $127" : "=a" (a) : "0" (num), "b" ((int)p1), "c" ((int)p2)); \
00033          return a; \
00034         }
